Overview
FileSystem_FATFS_RTOS_FATFS003 App

Overview

  1. Platform independence and easy to port
  2. Very small footprint for code and work area
  3. Various configuration options:
    1. Multiple volumes (physical drives and partitions)
    2. Multiple sector size support
    3. Read-only, minimized API, I/O buffer, etc.

The FatFs module is a free software opened for education, research and development.You can use, modify and/or redistribute it for personal projects or commercial products without any restriction under your responsibility.For further information, refer the link below:

  1. http://elm-chan.org/fsw/ff/00index_e.html
